metadata.dc:author: Mateo Garmilla, J I
Antépara, I
Sánchez Milla, J J
Pascual Izaola, A
metadata.dc:description: In this work we collect the results of the variation of the variable "rechange of the wind with the exterior" in the three possibilities of a bedroom: --close window, semi close and totally open. And we unite the relation that we already know between the prevail of acariens (Dermatophagoides) and the relative humidity of the wind in a Bilbao city's house.
metadata.dc:title: Humedad relativa y ácaros. Estudio de intervención.
[Relative humidity and acari. An intervention study].
